Author: Godbex Solutions
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [PRIVATE & PUBLIC SALE] [GBE] Godbex ICO is live on 24th Sept 2018!
Body: It’s time! GODBEX launches ICO with September 24, 2018 #joinus  Godbex - Secure and scalable next-generation gold bullion and cryptocurrency platform    “From bad news to a great success, from losing to winning, from panic towards GBE token”  Revolution of the existing trading markets by linking the oldest and newest world’s currencies  Combining the oldest and newest world’s currencies, GODBEX revolutionizes the existing trading markets by linking the current and future cryptocurrencies with gold bullion, while maximizes customer’s profit by taking into account price changes of both financial assets. Within  the  platform  user  has  four  modules  available:  Gold  Bullion  Market,  Exchange,  Digital  Bank  and  Digital Assets Management. Each user has one account assigned – access via web or mobile (Android, iOS), where his total balance is denoted as a combination of fiat currencies, cryptocurrencies and the amount of gold that the user owns.    Benefits  Real-time trading of gold bullion. Next-generation exchange where an investor can buy any cryptocurrency with either fiat currency or traditional unit of gold, a Troy ounce. Furthermore, exchange allows transfer of value from cryptocurrencies to gold bullion. Digital bank module that allows instant deposit/withdraw or payment using debit card. Debit card’s total balance represents a total value of fiat, cryptocurrency and gold. Consulting services for investment or trading with cryptocurrencies and gold bullions.     While cryptocurrency traders have recognized gold bullion as an excellent exit from cryptocurrencies when its price is decreasing, the traditional investors have recognized cryptocurrency as a prospective and certainly interesting investment segment that can provide high return of investment in a short period of time. And since the cryptocurrency investment can be partially compared with investing in stocks, gold is certainly an instrument that prevents loss of equity, so avoidance of inflation and value retention are guaranteed. Watch the video here!   Token Sale  Token: GBE Price: 1 GBE = 1.25 USD ICO start: 24 Sep 2018 ICO end: 31 Jan 2019 Platform: Ethereum Accepting: BTC, ETH, Fiat (USD and EUR), Gold bullion Soft cap: 20,500,000.00 USD Hard cap: 91,250,000.00 USD  GODBEX token is much awaited! ICO sale is live right away from September 24th, 2018 till January 31st, 2019. The GBE token, utility token, will be official currency of the GODBEX platform and has three main applications:  Bridge, i.e. link for value transfer between cryptocurrency and gold bullion and vice versa; Significant discount (minimum of 50%) when user use GBE token to pay transaction fees; For listing on our exchange, interested parties will have to contribute with a certain amount of GBE tokens.    Join us!  WEB: https://godbex.io/ TWITTER: https://twitter.com/Godbex_Ltd MEDIUM: https://medium.com/godbex TELEGRAM: https://t.me/Godbex YOUTUBE / VIDEO: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jO_qmXaiJ98 WHITEPAPER LINK: https://godbex.io/assets/documents/GODBEX-whitepaper-ENGLISH.pdf

Author: Krezz2017
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [PRIVATE & PUBLIC SALE] [GBE] Godbex ICO is live on 24th Sept 2018!
Body: You write that your platform is designed to trade gold bullion. And how much is it legal? Gold, as far as I know, is under the supervision of the state.

Author: Godbex Solutions
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [PRIVATE & PUBLIC SALE] [GBE] Godbex ICO is live on 24th Sept 2018!
Body: Most commonly gold is used for portfolio diversification by private investors, organizations and also by central banks. State authorities keep record on (monetary) gold owned by central banks. Meanwhile, trading gold bullion on Godbex platform will be licensed and in accordance with international legislation, rules and quality controls.

Author: dugidox
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [PRIVATE & PUBLIC SALE] [GBE] Godbex ICO is live on 24th Sept 2018!
Body: What is special with your exchange model, as you say Next-generation exchange, Bitstamp has gold bullion's available for withdrawal from 2015-2016, so it isn't anything new??? How do you plan handle legal compliance as you are planning open digital bank? You need payment institution license, Coinbase acquired license not long ago

Author: Godbex Solutions
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [PRIVATE & PUBLIC SALE] [GBE] Godbex ICO is live on 24th Sept 2018!
Body: In cooperation with company Moro&Kunst Ltd. (whose representatives are part of Godbex team), Bitstamp was the first cryptocurrency exchange to offer the option of gold withdrawal, that was in late 2015. Godbex Exchange Module will not only enable gold purchase (withdrawal) but also a fast, cost efficient and easy position change between cryptocurrency and gold bars. Godbex exchange will introduce trading pair crypto/gold (one Troy ounce). Our partner Ceferin Law Firm is already preparing the necessary documentation for obtaining the digital bank license.

Author: Godbex Solutions
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [PRIVATE & PUBLIC SALE] [GBE] Godbex ICO is live on 24th Sept 2018!
Body: Ceferin Law firm, whose representatives are part of Godbex team, have started preparing all necessary legal documents for obtaining the license for Godbex Digital Bank. Therefore, we are fully prepared and once the soft cap is reached the process of obtaining digital bank license will run effectively. According to our road map, the license will be obtained in a few months.

Author: Godbex Solutions
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [PRIVATE & PUBLIC SALE] [GBE] Godbex ICO is live on 24th Sept 2018!
Body: All Godbex users will have the possibility to buy / trade one Troy ounce gold bars (31.1035 g of pure gold) using GBE token as a bridge between crypto and gold. Each Troy ounce of gold will be backed by real Troy ounce gold bar, produced by certified refiners listed on Good Delivery list, issued by London Bullion Market Association. Good Delivery standard is the most reputable quality standard of gold in the market. Good Delivery bars have unique serial numbers, so that ownership of gold bars is transparent. Gold bars can be deposited in Godbex vaults (storage content will be fully insured and audited on a monthly basis) or delivered to user’s home address. These gold bars will be supplied by our long-term partners, world’s leading mints. Company Moro&Kunst Ltd. has been successfully cooperating with the mints for the last two decades, promoting the unique and traditional role of gold and supplying certified gold bars with the highest quality to individuals and companies.

As per my knowledge you cannot come to mint and buy 100kg Gold bars just like that From Whitepaper i see that you have 2 different gold markets, how do you plan organize price on both markets, it will be same on both for 1 troy oz?

Author: Godbex Solutions
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [PRIVATE & PUBLIC SALE] [GBE] Godbex ICO is live on 24th Sept 2018!
Body: Just like you said, not everyone can buy gold directly from mint. There are certain requirements, procedures and strict rules to become mint's partner. Company Moro & Kunst Ltd. succeeded to establish such partnerships long ago with Argor Heraeus and PAMP from Switzerland and Austrian Mint from Vienna. Godbex will be included in these partnerships and will add some new ones in other regions as demand grows. Therefore, we will be able to deliver fast unlimited amount of gold bars with the highest quality.  The two modules, Gold Bullion Trading and Exchange, will operate independently, so the price of one Troy ounce will be formated differently. Within Gold Exchange module users will be able to buy and sell gold bars from 1 to 5.000 grams. Prices will be formed on the basis of current price of gold in spot market and the trading margin. In the Exchange module only one Troy ounce gold bars will be tradable and the price will be determined by exchange market only (bid/ask principle).

Author: Godbex Solutions
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [PRIVATE & PUBLIC SALE] [GBE] Godbex ICO is live on 24th Sept 2018!
Body: Thanks for your support, we will do our best to meet your expectations and make this project big and successful. When talking about softcap and hardcap, we need to take a closer look to the structure of the whole project. Our platform actually consists of 4 projects (modules): Gold Bullion Market Module, Exchange, Digital Bank Module, Digital Assets Management Module. For example, just a process of achieving Digital Bank License is very costly (for more details, check budget allocation in whitepaper). Therefore, our softcap and hardcap are carefully chosen, in order to reflect all financial assets needed to successfully bring this project to the stated goal.

Author: dugidox
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [PRIVATE & PUBLIC SALE] [GBE] Godbex ICO is live on 24th Sept 2018!
Body: So if i understand good, users will be able to withdraw gold bullions from exchange too, Troy ounce gold bars? Example if i put 1 BTC and transfer through GBE to gold pair, then in 2 months i have 20 ounces. Am i able withdraw those 20 ounces from the exchange in a physical way?

Author: Godbex Solutions
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [PRIVATE & PUBLIC SALE] [GBE] Godbex ICO is live on 24th Sept 2018!
Body: Yes, all verified users will be able to transfer theirs value from cryptocurrency to gold bullions and vice versa using GBE token as a bridge. For example, if your account on Godbex platform has a balance of 1 BTC, you can convert value of 1 BTC into corresponding number of ounces via GBE token, based on the trading rate in the time of transaction. Afterwards, after buying gold bars, user will have two main options: gold delivery or vault deposit. Namely, Godbex user can order a fast and guaranteed delivery straightforward at his home address, where the gold delivery will be performed by FedEx in a few business days, or, store the purchased gold bars in our Vault. Secured storage will be managed by our partner Loomis International in USA, Switzerland and Hong Kong. Storage content will be audited and checked by an external auditor on a monthly basis.  Moreover, both cryptocurrencies and gold bullions will be tradable on our platform, so you will have chance to increase your wealth.

Author: Godbex Solutions
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [PRIVATE & PUBLIC SALE] [GBE] Godbex ICO is live on 24th Sept 2018!
Body: It’s just a matter of time when gold as a ‘safe haven’ will take the lead again   Gold typically does well in times of market turmoil, therefore concerning the current economic and geopolitical circumstances (trading tensions between US and China, low interest rates and inflation, massive debt, migration issues in Europe and Venezuela etc.) investors should expect gold price to rise.  Comparing cryptocurrency volatility with gold volatility there are minor price changes and addressing the vision of GODBEX there is no better ‘fusion’, where traders from either gold or crypto side will be able to change the positions from crypto to gold and vice versa at a single exchange platform. Author: Godbex Solutions
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [PRIVATE & PUBLIC SALE] [GBE] Godbex ICO is live on 24th Sept 2018!
Body: Digital Bank for the blockchain era with 24/7 live support   Not only that blockchain will change the world — is the first ever technology that has huge potential for humanity. According to McKinsey, blockchain will reach its full potential in 5 years and from the banking industry perspective,  90% of American and European banks are exploring blockchain, according to PricewaterhouseCoopers. In addition to traditional banking products (account opening, globally accepted IBAN, using debit cards, deposits and withdrawals), GODBEX Digital Bank will enable customers to use all the assets that are associated with their account: fiat currency, cryptocurrency and gold bullion.
